original_title: Presidential Election: Deposit placed for Sajith Premadasa
original_body_lines: Samagi Jana Balawegaya (SJB) General Secretary Ranjith Madduma Bandara has placed a deposit with the Election Commission on behalf of party leader Sajith Premadasa as a candidate for the 2024 Presidential Election.
He had placed the deposit this morning (31) at the Election Commission Office in Rajagiriya.
